alert.note: Alert for Northern Hancock; Southern Hancock (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 2:40PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WESTERN HARRISON AND EAST CENTRAL HANCOCK COUNTIES THROUGH 315 PM CDT... At 239 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Saucier, or 17 miles northwest of Gulfport, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Long Beach, Diamondhead, Lyman, Saucier, Kiln, and Gulfport Airport. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 18 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
